pullRequest.title: Participant manager's service /sites end point repositories and entity classes
pullRequest.bodyText:
Participant manager's service [POST] /sites endpoint repositories and entity classes only along with common module implementation.
We will be raising multiple follow up PRs for the same [POST]  /sites endpoint to reduce the no of LOC.  Request you to please review and approve the PRs accordingly.

nodes.bodyText:
Suggesting Google naming convention: timestamp fields ending with _time. Could you make sure other PR's follow this convention for consistency also

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
              @Column(
          
          
            
                  name = "created",
          
          
            
                  insertable = false,
          
          
            
                  updatable = false,
          
          
            
                  columnDefinition = "TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP")
          
          
            
              private Timestamp created;
          
          
            
              @Column(
          
          
            
                  name = "created_time",
          
          
            
                  insertable = false,
          
          
            
                  updatable = false,
          
          
            
                  columnDefinition = "TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP")
          
          
            
              private Timestamp createdTime;

created_time

                  updatable = false,
          
          
            
                  columnDefinition = "TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP")

What is the Integer value supposed to represent here? We need a better name for this field.
Change column name to can_edit, too
